history.proof: intros m k x z t Hmap Hsucc Heqc. revert z t Heqc. induction m. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros z t' [H | H]. + inversion H; unfold eqc; auto. + sfirstorder depth: 3. - qauto depth: 4 l: on use: eqc_B_CS.

ctx: intros m k x z t Hmap Hsucc Heqc.
tactic: intros z t [H | H]; inversion H; contradiction.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 0 branches.

ctx: intros m k x z t Hmap Hsucc Heqc.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros m k x z t Hmap Hsucc Heqc.
intros m k x z t Hmap Hsucc Heqc.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros m k x z t Hmap Hsucc Heqc. revert z t Heqc. induction m. - intros z t [H | H]; inversion H; contradiction. - intros z t [H | H]. + inversion H; unfold eqc; auto. + apply IHm; auto. - intros z t [H | [H | H]]. + left; apply IHm; auto. + right; left; auto. + right; right; auto.
